name: risk_weight
question: How risk averse are you? Consider the following situation: A lottery gives € 10.000 50% of the time and € 0 the other 50% of the time. So the payoff is € 5.000.

options.label: Would you take the € 5.000 with certainty and therefore not having a chance to get the whole € 10.000?
Would you play the lottery and take the chance to win € 10.000 but also risk not receiving anything?
Would you take both of these situations?

name: esg_weight
question: If investing in a company, do you take the ESG score in consideration? Meaning it is important to you that your money is invested in a company that is managing its environment, social and governance liabilities well.

options.label: Yes, it is important to me to keep a sustainable portfolio.
No, it doesn't effect my decision to invest or not.
It is neither important nor unimportant to me.
